summary: The dispersion package implements the plasma dispersion function Z(ζ) and its derivative, using the complex error function and supporting physical units for seamless integration into plasma physics calculations. It also supplies a compatibility layer that forwards legacy calls to the modern implementation.
business_intent: Provide researchers and engineers with a reliable, unit‑aware tool for evaluating the plasma dispersion function, facilitating accurate modeling of wave propagation, Landau damping, and related phenomena in plasma simulations while preserving backward compatibility for existing codebases.
